caption: inputValuesExtraction
doc: Extract the values of input when triggering

AAR.caption: RG Group ID Attribute
AAR.doc: Activate the settings feature "Expose the option to add an ID Attribute to HTML elements". Choose an ID value for the repeating group and input it in this field.
AAR.name: rggroupid

AAW.caption: debug Logs
AAW.doc: Click this checkbox to activate the generation of logs in the browser console
AAW.name: debuglogs
